author: danielf
msg: SitemapTestCase is a base class for sitemap based functional testing, see generation/VirtualPipelineGeneratorTestCase for an example. Not much features and probably rather buggy this far. It uses the MockEnvironment as environment and the MockEnvironment hasn't full functionality yet.
